content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":261832,"originalJapaneseLine":"いったんランス城に戻るか、戻るといっても衛星攻撃をかいくぐりながらなので大変だが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Should I return to Rance Castle for now? Though even returning means dodging the satellite attacks, so it'll be tough..."},{"lineNumber":261833,"originalJapaneseLine":"if (確認(\"パットンが居る\")==1) ハンティが居る場合、俺が連れていってやろうか、老化するかもしれないけど、いひひ","translatedEnglishLine":"If (check(\"Patton is here\") == 1) If Hunti is here, should I take him along? Might cause aging though, hehe."},{"lineNumber":261834,"originalJapaneseLine":"戻っても、あれに狙われ続ける事には違いないだろうが","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if I return, there's no doubt I'll keep being targeted by that thing."},{"lineNumber":261835,"originalJapaneseLine":"どっちにしろ選択は","translatedEnglishLine":"Either way, the choice is..."},{"lineNumber":261836,"originalJapaneseLine":"衛星兵器を倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat the satellite weapon."},{"lineNumber":261837,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人パイアールを倒す、奴を倒せばあれも動かなくなるのだろう。たぶん・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat the demon Paial; if we beat him, that thing probably won't operate anymore. Probably..."},{"lineNumber":261838,"originalJapaneseLine":"それか、ランスがずっと外に出ないかだね（これは誰かがちゃかして言う）","translatedEnglishLine":"Or, Rance just doesn't go outside at all (someone teases saying this)."},{"lineNumber":261839,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜、シィルとエッチしている","translatedEnglishLine":"At night, having sex with Syl."},{"lineNumber":261840,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様は作戦を考えるからお前が動けと騎乗位","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm thinking of a strategy, so you move, riding position."},{"lineNumber":261841,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルがんばって腰をふる","translatedEnglishLine":"Syl works hard, moving her hips."},{"lineNumber":261842,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふと、ランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, Rance..."},{"lineNumber":261843,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見下ろされているみたいでむかつく","translatedEnglishLine":"Feels like being looked down on, it pisses me off."},{"lineNumber":261844,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの衛星兵器と同じだ、上空から俺様を見下ろしやがって","translatedEnglishLine":"Just like that satellite weapon, looking down on me from above."},{"lineNumber":261845,"originalJapaneseLine":"とシィルを押し倒し自分が上になる","translatedEnglishLine":"So he pushes Syl down and takes the top position himself."},{"lineNumber":261846,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだ、こうでなければいけない。","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, this is how it should be."},{"lineNumber":261847,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺が上、お前が下","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm on top, you're beneath."},{"lineNumber":261848,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様が動くのめんどくさいと言うから・・・そうしていたのに","translatedEnglishLine":"Because Lord Rance said it was troublesome to move... so I was doing it that way."},{"lineNumber":261849,"originalJapaneseLine":"ずこずこ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Thrust thrust..."},{"lineNumber":261850,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだ、これが正しい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, this is right."},{"lineNumber":261851,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様が見下ろされるなんて・・・そうだ、あの衛星兵器もだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"For me to be looked down on... that's right, just like that satellite weapon."},{"lineNumber":261852,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、なるほど","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, I see."},{"lineNumber":261853,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌朝、ランスは主要メンバーを集めて説明","translatedEnglishLine":"The next morning, Rance gathers the main members and explains."},{"lineNumber":261854,"originalJapaneseLine":"衛星兵器を倒す、作戦は簡単だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat the satellite weapon; the plan is simple."},{"lineNumber":261855,"originalJapaneseLine":"奴の所まで飛べないのなら、奴より高い所にいって飛び乗ればいい","translatedEnglishLine":"If we can't fly up to it, then we go higher than it and jump onto it."},{"lineNumber":261856,"originalJapaneseLine":"まさか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No way..."},{"lineNumber":261857,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだ、翔竜山だ、あの世界一高い山なら、衛星兵器が飛んでいる場所より高いだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, Mt. Shoryuu. If it's the highest mountain in the world, it should be higher than where the satellite weapon flies."},{"lineNumber":261858,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが補足　やっぱミラクルかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone adds: It's gotta be Miracle, right?"},{"lineNumber":261859,"originalJapaneseLine":"　衛星兵器はランスの頭上に位置し、ランスが動けばついてくる","translatedEnglishLine":"The satellite weapon is positioned above Rance's head and follows his movements."},{"lineNumber":261860,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスが翔竜山を登ると、衛星兵器もついてくるが","translatedEnglishLine":"When Rance climbs Mt. Shoryuu, the satellite weapon follows him,"},{"lineNumber":261861,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どんどん登っていくと衛星兵器とランスの位置は重なる訳か","translatedEnglishLine":"So as he climbs higher, the satellite weapon's position coincides with Rance's."},{"lineNumber":261862,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは図解した方がいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe this should be illustrated."},{"lineNumber":261863,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、衛星兵器が翔竜山より高い所を飛んでいるという可能性は無いのか","translatedEnglishLine":"But isn't there a possibility the satellite weapon flies higher than Mt. Shoryuu?"},{"lineNumber":261864,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは無い、この世界では翔竜山より高い所を飛ぶと壁にぶつかると言われている","translatedEnglishLine":"No, in this world it's said that if you fly higher than Mt. Shoryuu, you'll hit a wall."},{"lineNumber":261865,"originalJapaneseLine":"伝説だから確かめた事は無いが、たぶん事実だろう","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a legend, so no one has confirmed it, but it's probably true."},{"lineNumber":261866,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、登山に出発するぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's depart for the climb."},{"lineNumber":261867,"originalJapaneseLine":"翔竜山の麓に到着する","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrive at the foot of Mt. Shoryuu."},{"lineNumber":261868,"originalJapaneseLine":"高い・・・標高は１２０００メートルと言われている","translatedEnglishLine":"So high... it's said to have an altitude of 12,000 meters."},{"lineNumber":261869,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは過去に１回登った事がある、その話題","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance has climbed it once before; conversation about that."},{"lineNumber":261870,"originalJapaneseLine":"歴史上登った者は誰もいないとされているので快挙、ミラクルも褒める","translatedEnglishLine":"Since no one is said to have climbed it in history, it's an achievement; Miracle compliments him."},{"lineNumber":261871,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時も大変だったが、今回も登るぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"It was tough last time too, but we'll climb it again this time."},{"lineNumber":261872,"originalJapaneseLine":"標高２０００地点","translatedEnglishLine":"At the 2,000-meter altitude point."},{"lineNumber":261873,"originalJapaneseLine":"上空を見る、衛星兵器がはるか上をついてきている","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking up, the satellite weapon is following far above."},{"lineNumber":261874,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだまだ奴の方が高い位置にいるな","translatedEnglishLine":"That thing is still positioned higher."},{"lineNumber":261875,"originalJapaneseLine":"標高５０００メートル","translatedEnglishLine":"At 5,000 meters altitude."},{"lineNumber":261876,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、ドラゴンです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance, it's a dragon!"},{"lineNumber":261877,"originalJapaneseLine":"どういう訳か、この山はドラゴンが居るからな","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, there are dragons on this mountain."},{"lineNumber":261878,"originalJapaneseLine":"倒さないと進めない、だから倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"We can't proceed without defeating it, so we'll defeat it."},{"lineNumber":261879,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"＞Battle"},{"lineNumber":261880,"originalJapaneseLine":"標高８０００メートル","translatedEnglishLine":"At 8,000 meters altitude."},{"lineNumber":261881,"originalJapaneseLine":"ドラゴンを発見する","translatedEnglishLine":"Discover a dragon."},{"lineNumber":261882,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、また戦闘するか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, another battle it is..."},{"lineNumber":261883,"originalJapaneseLine":"if (確認(\"デッキにリア有り\")==1){","translatedEnglishLine":"if (check(\"Ria is in the deck\") == 1) {"},{"lineNumber":261884,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リアのカードが実装されている時のみ、はるまき関係の設定説明","translatedEnglishLine":"  Only when Ria's card is implemented, explanation related to Harumaki."},{"lineNumber":261885,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　はるまき（ライトニングドラゴンの子供）","translatedEnglishLine":"    Harumaki (child of the Lightning Dragon)"},{"lineNumber":261886,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　大きなドラゴンが小さくて可愛いボディになっている","translatedEnglishLine":"    A big dragon turned into a small and cute body."},{"lineNumber":261887,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　多分誰か高位の魔法使いか何者かに呪いをかけられたのでしょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"    Probably cursed by some high-level magician or someone."},{"lineNumber":261888,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"＞Battle"},{"lineNumber":261889,"originalJapaneseLine":"標高８５００地点","translatedEnglishLine":"At the 8,500-meter altitude point."},{"lineNumber":261890,"originalJapaneseLine":"上空を見る、衛星兵器が上をついてきている","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking up, the satellite weapon is following above."},{"lineNumber":261891,"originalJapaneseLine":"だいぶ近くななってきたな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's gotten pretty close."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったんランス城に戻るか、戻るといっても衛星攻撃をかいくぐりながらなので大変だが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Should I return to Rance Castle for now? Though even returning means dodging the satellite attacks, so it'll be tough...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("パットンが居る")==1) ハンティが居る場合、俺が連れていってやろうか、老化するかもしれないけど、いひひ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If (check("Patton is here") == 1) If Hunti is here, should I take him along? Might cause aging though, hehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戻っても、あれに狙われ続ける事には違いないだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if I return, there's no doubt I'll keep being targeted by that thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちにしろ選択は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Either way, the choice is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衛星兵器を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the satellite weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人パイアールを倒す、奴を倒せばあれも動かなくなるのだろう。たぶん・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the demon Paial; if we beat him, that thing probably won't operate anymore. Probably...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それか、ランスがずっと外に出ないかだね（これは誰かがちゃかして言う）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or, Rance just doesn't go outside at all (someone teases saying this).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、シィルとエッチしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At night, having sex with Syl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様は作戦を考えるからお前が動けと騎乗位
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm thinking of a strategy, so you move, riding position.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがんばって腰をふる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syl works hard, moving her hips.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと、ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見下ろされているみたいでむかつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feels like being looked down on, it pisses me off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの衛星兵器と同じだ、上空から俺様を見下ろしやがって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just like that satellite weapon, looking down on me from above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とシィルを押し倒し自分が上になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So he pushes Syl down and takes the top position himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、こうでなければいけない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, this is how it should be.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が上、お前が下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm on top, you're beneath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様が動くのめんどくさいと言うから・・・そうしていたのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Lord Rance said it was troublesome to move... so I was doing it that way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずこずこ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thrust thrust...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、これが正しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, this is right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が見下ろされるなんて・・・そうだ、あの衛星兵器もだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For me to be looked down on... that's right, just like that satellite weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、なるほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌朝、ランスは主要メンバーを集めて説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next morning, Rance gathers the main members and explains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衛星兵器を倒す、作戦は簡単だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the satellite weapon; the plan is simple.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴の所まで飛べないのなら、奴より高い所にいって飛び乗ればいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can't fly up to it, then we go higher than it and jump onto it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、翔竜山だ、あの世界一高い山なら、衛星兵器が飛んでいる場所より高いだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, Mt. Shoryuu. If it's the highest mountain in the world, it should be higher than where the satellite weapon flies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが補足　やっぱミラクルかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone adds: It's gotta be Miracle, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衛星兵器はランスの頭上に位置し、ランスが動けばついてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The satellite weapon is positioned above Rance's head and follows his movements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが翔竜山を登ると、衛星兵器もついてくるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance climbs Mt. Shoryuu, the satellite weapon follows him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんどん登っていくと衛星兵器とランスの位置は重なる訳か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So as he climbs higher, the satellite weapon's position coincides with Rance's.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは図解した方がいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe this should be illustrated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、衛星兵器が翔竜山より高い所を飛んでいるという可能性は無いのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But isn't there a possibility the satellite weapon flies higher than Mt. Shoryuu?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは無い、この世界では翔竜山より高い所を飛ぶと壁にぶつかると言われている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, in this world it's said that if you fly higher than Mt. Shoryuu, you'll hit a wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伝説だから確かめた事は無いが、たぶん事実だろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a legend, so no one has confirmed it, but it's probably true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、登山に出発するぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's depart for the climb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の麓に到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at the foot of Mt. Shoryuu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高い・・・標高は１２０００メートルと言われている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So high... it's said to have an altitude of 12,000 meters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは過去に１回登った事がある、その話題
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has climbed it once before; conversation about that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴史上登った者は誰もいないとされているので快挙、ミラクルも褒める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since no one is said to have climbed it in history, it's an achievement; Miracle compliments him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時も大変だったが、今回も登るぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was tough last time too, but we'll climb it again this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 標高２０００地点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the 2,000-meter altitude point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上空を見る、衛星兵器がはるか上をついてきている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking up, the satellite weapon is following far above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ奴の方が高い位置にいるな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That thing is still positioned higher.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 標高５０００メートル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At 5,000 meters altitude.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、ドラゴンです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, it's a dragon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう訳か、この山はドラゴンが居るからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, there are dragons on this mountain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒さないと進めない、だから倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't proceed without defeating it, so we'll defeat it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＞Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 標高８０００メートル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At 8,000 meters altitude.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドラゴンを発見する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discover a dragon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、また戦闘するか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, another battle it is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("デッキにリア有り")==1){
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (check("Ria is in the deck") == 1) {

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアのカードが実装されている時のみ、はるまき関係の設定説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only when Ria's card is implemented, explanation related to Harumaki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はるまき（ライトニングドラゴンの子供）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Harumaki (child of the Lightning Dragon)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きなドラゴンが小さくて可愛いボディになっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A big dragon turned into a small and cute body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多分誰か高位の魔法使いか何者かに呪いをかけられたのでしょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably cursed by some high-level magician or someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＞Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 標高８５００地点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the 8,500-meter altitude point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上空を見る、衛星兵器が上をついてきている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking up, the satellite weapon is following above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいぶ近くななってきたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's gotten pretty close.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったんランス城に戻るか、戻るといっても衛星攻撃をかいくぐりながらなので大変だが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Should I return to Rance Castle for now? Though even returning means dodging the satellite attacks, so it'll be tough...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("パットンが居る")==1) ハンティが居る場合、俺が連れていってやろうか、老化するかもしれないけど、いひひ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If (check("Patton is here") == 1) If Hunti is here, should I take him along? Might cause aging though, hehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戻っても、あれに狙われ続ける事には違いないだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if I return, there's no doubt I'll keep being targeted by that thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちにしろ選択は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Either way, the choice is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衛星兵器を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the satellite weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人パイアールを倒す、奴を倒せばあれも動かなくなるのだろう。たぶん・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the demon Paial; if we beat him, that thing probably won't operate anymore. Probably...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それか、ランスがずっと外に出ないかだね（これは誰かがちゃかして言う）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or, Rance just doesn't go outside at all (someone teases saying this).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、シィルとエッチしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At night, having sex with Syl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様は作戦を考えるからお前が動けと騎乗位
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm thinking of a strategy, so you move, riding position.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがんばって腰をふる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syl works hard, moving her hips.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと、ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見下ろされているみたいでむかつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feels like being looked down on, it pisses me off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの衛星兵器と同じだ、上空から俺様を見下ろしやがって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just like that satellite weapon, looking down on me from above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とシィルを押し倒し自分が上になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So he pushes Syl down and takes the top position himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、こうでなければいけない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, this is how it should be.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が上、お前が下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm on top, you're beneath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様が動くのめんどくさいと言うから・・・そうしていたのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Lord Rance said it was troublesome to move... so I was doing it that way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずこずこ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thrust thrust...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、これが正しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, this is right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が見下ろされるなんて・・・そうだ、あの衛星兵器もだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For me to be looked down on... that's right, just like that satellite weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、なるほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌朝、ランスは主要メンバーを集めて説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next morning, Rance gathers the main members and explains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衛星兵器を倒す、作戦は簡単だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the satellite weapon; the plan is simple.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴の所まで飛べないのなら、奴より高い所にいって飛び乗ればいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can't fly up to it, then we go higher than it and jump onto it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、翔竜山だ、あの世界一高い山なら、衛星兵器が飛んでいる場所より高いだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, Mt. Shoryuu. If it's the highest mountain in the world, it should be higher than where the satellite weapon flies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが補足　やっぱミラクルかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone adds: It's gotta be Miracle, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衛星兵器はランスの頭上に位置し、ランスが動けばついてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The satellite weapon is positioned above Rance's head and follows his movements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが翔竜山を登ると、衛星兵器もついてくるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance climbs Mt. Shoryuu, the satellite weapon follows him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんどん登っていくと衛星兵器とランスの位置は重なる訳か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So as he climbs higher, the satellite weapon's position coincides with Rance's.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは図解した方がいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe this should be illustrated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、衛星兵器が翔竜山より高い所を飛んでいるという可能性は無いのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But isn't there a possibility the satellite weapon flies higher than Mt. Shoryuu?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは無い、この世界では翔竜山より高い所を飛ぶと壁にぶつかると言われている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, in this world it's said that if you fly higher than Mt. Shoryuu, you'll hit a wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伝説だから確かめた事は無いが、たぶん事実だろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a legend, so no one has confirmed it, but it's probably true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、登山に出発するぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's depart for the climb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の麓に到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at the foot of Mt. Shoryuu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高い・・・標高は１２０００メートルと言われている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So high... it's said to have an altitude of 12,000 meters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは過去に１回登った事がある、その話題
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has climbed it once before; conversation about that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴史上登った者は誰もいないとされているので快挙、ミラクルも褒める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since no one is said to have climbed it in history, it's an achievement; Miracle compliments him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時も大変だったが、今回も登るぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was tough last time too, but we'll climb it again this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 標高２０００地点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the 2,000-meter altitude point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上空を見る、衛星兵器がはるか上をついてきている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking up, the satellite weapon is following far above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ奴の方が高い位置にいるな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That thing is still positioned higher.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 標高５０００メートル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At 5,000 meters altitude.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、ドラゴンです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, it's a dragon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう訳か、この山はドラゴンが居るからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, there are dragons on this mountain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒さないと進めない、だから倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't proceed without defeating it, so we'll defeat it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＞Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 標高８０００メートル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At 8,000 meters altitude.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドラゴンを発見する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discover a dragon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、また戦闘するか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, another battle it is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("デッキにリア有り")==1){
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (check("Ria is in the deck") == 1) {

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアのカードが実装されている時のみ、はるまき関係の設定説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only when Ria's card is implemented, explanation related to Harumaki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はるまき（ライトニングドラゴンの子供）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Harumaki (child of the Lightning Dragon)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きなドラゴンが小さくて可愛いボディになっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A big dragon turned into a small and cute body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多分誰か高位の魔法使いか何者かに呪いをかけられたのでしょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably cursed by some high-level magician or someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＞Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 標高８５００地点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the 8,500-meter altitude point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上空を見る、衛星兵器が上をついてきている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking up, the satellite weapon is following above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいぶ近くななってきたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's gotten pretty close.
